content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court decided to dissolve a marriage and awarded various movable properties to the applicant including a tv computer surveillance cameras washing machine boiler curtains table saw and cultivator the defendant was ordered to pay the applicant compensation for a greater share of the property the text also discusses the legal aspects of matrimonial property such as the statutory regime joint property personal property and grounds for terminating the matrimonial community property the parties involved are identified as r ž and a ž the court approved the dissolution of the marriage and determined the division of matrimonial property the applicant was ordered to pay compensation to the defendant and the defendant was ordered to pay costs
